about_the_game:
Become an idol in VR! A new casual VR action game where you can enjoy shooting and dancing with your favorite music!

Become an idol and bring excitement to the stage!
Fun Pop Rhythm Stage ~Aim for the♡~" is a new type of idol experience action casual VR game where you become an idol and liven up the stage with Fansa（Meet&Greet） and dances.
The game is equipped with a function that reads your song data (mp3, wav, etc.) and automatically generates a music score, allowing you to play the game with your favorite songs.

In this game, the player alternates between the "Shooting Section（Fansa Section）" in which the player shoots fans who appear one after another during the live performance, and the "Dance Section" in which the player dances to the music.



Shooting the hearts of fans!
The "Shooting Section" is a shooting game in which you have to shoot out Fan's Cheering fan.
There are three types of Fansa: "Shoot me", "Give me V-Sign", and "Give me Heart sign".
Quickly identify and return the Fansa（Meet&Greet） to get evaluation points from the fans!


Dance and get the voltage up!
The "Dance Section" is a dance game in which you trace the Slider that appear in the space.
The voltage gauge, which indicates the excitement of the audience, rises when you dance successfully!
The higher the voltage gauge is, the more bonus points will be added to the evaluation points in the Shooting Section.


Two theme songs are included!
In the "Play Demo Songs" mode, you can play with two songs that are the theme songs of this work, "Hajimaru Ne☆彡" Karin ver. (CV. Reio Kurachi) and "Hajimaru Ne☆彡" Zakuro ver. (CV. Shun Abe)!


Idol experience with your favorite songs!
This title is equipped with an "automatic music score generation function" that generates a music score by importing your own music data (MP3, WAV format).
Please enjoy this title by generating a music score with your favorite song.


Story.
The president of an office on the verge of bankruptcy discovered that you have a talent for Fansa! and you are now set to make your idol debut.
With the support of your twin idols, Karin Seira and Zakuro Seira, you will struggle to win the hearts of your fans with your Fansa and dance moves.

Navigation Character
Karin Seira (CV. Reo Kurachi)



Zakuro Seira(CV. Shun Abe)



Cautions
When using the automatic music score generation function (in-game function name: "Play with your favorite music") to distribute or post videos of game play with various music data loaded, please be sure to confirm that you have obtained the permission of the copyright holder (copyright holder) for the music.
Unauthorized use without permission may be punishable by law.

We do not collect, check, or save any of the music data loaded by the automatic music score generation function. Please check with the respective copyright holders by yourself.
We are not responsible for any trouble caused by users using the various functions of this game to distribute or post videos. Please understand this in advance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OculusPC, VR headset, and motion controller required
  • Additional Notes: devices tested: Oculus CV1, Meta Quest, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3
